page.title: 13WALKING COUNTRY IN STRETTON
page.content: The most popular walks in Church Stretton are hill walking. The longest hill, the{Long Mynd}is the favourite. There is also a steep walk up{Caradoc.}If you want to visit the cave you have to go to the top first and then scramble down the hillside to the cave. Often there are sponsored walks in Church Stretton. One of the biggest is the{SAVE THE CHILDREN WALK.}It is 15 miles long, over the Long Mynd to the Bridges pub and it starts and finshes at Church Stretton School. Most of the walk is up hill. It is a lot of fun but tiring and lots of people get blisters. {THE LONG MYND HIKE}is more difficult and covers 50 miles, eight hills and 6000 ft in 24 hours. The winner's time in 1985 was 9 hours 16 minutes. Church Stretton is a wonderful place to walk.
